member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SR
member.summary: Internal class for retrieving information from an assembly's resource file.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SR.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the resource string using the specified name and default culture.
member.param: Name of the string resource to return.
member.returns: Null if the name is null; otherwise a string from the resource for the default culture.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SR.GetString(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns the resource string using the specified resource name and default culture. The string is then formatted using the arguments specified.
member.param: Name of the string resource to return.
Arguments supplied to the string.Format method when formatting the string.
member.returns: Null if the name is null; otherwise a formatted string using the resource specified.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SR.GetString(System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the resource string using the culture and name specified.
member.param: Culture whose resource should loaded. The resource will go through a fallback process to locate the appropriate resources.
Name of the string resource to return.
member.returns: Null if the name is null; otherwise a localized string for specified culture.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SR.GetString(System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns the resource string using the name and culture specified. The string is then formatted using the arguments specified.
member.param: Culture whose resource should loaded. The resource will go through a fallback process to locate the appropriate resources.
Name of the string resource to return.
Arguments supplied to the string.Format method when formatting the string.
member.returns: Null if the name is null; otherwise a formatted string using the resource specified.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SR.GetBitmap(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a Bitmap from this assembly's resources.
member.param: The resource name of the Bitmap to get.
member.returns: The requested Bitmap.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.LocalizedCategoryAttribute
member.summary: Internal class for returning a localized category string

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.LocalizedCategoryAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new LocalizedCategoryAttribute
member.param: Name of the resource containing the localizable category name

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.LocalizedCategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the localized category name
member.param: Name of the category to retreive
member.returns: The localized string value

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.LocalizedDescriptionAttribute
member.summary: Internal class for returning the localized description string

member.name: M:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.LocalizedDescriptionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a LocalizedDescriptionAttribute
member.param: Name of the resource containing the localizable description

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SparklineDisplayType
member.summary: Represents the type of sparkline

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SparklineDisplayType.Line
member.summary: Display the sparkline as a line.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SparklineDisplayType.Area
member.summary: Display the sparkline as a filled polygon.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SparklineDisplayType.Column
member.summary: Display the sparkline as a set of columns.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.SparklineDisplayType.WinLoss
member.summary: Display the sparkline as a set of columns on a boolean scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Win.DataVisualization.UltraSparkline.ActualPixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets the actual scaling value used by the component to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.
